item.description:
MEGAN ANDERSON'S "Off the Record" CD RELEASE PARTY

Thursday, September 13th
8:00 pm, doors @ 7:30 pm
The Midway, 3496 Washington Street, Jamaica Plain
[ 21+ ] $5 cover



Singer-songwriter Megan Anderson is releasing a full-length
album titled "Off the Record." Come listen to her rock out
after Kit Yan (fabulous Slam Poet) opens. Doors open at 7:30...
Queeraoke will immediately follow. A $5 cover includes the
show and admission to Queeraoke. Don't miss this night of fun
and sexy music, where folk meets indie rock with a splash of
ambience.

For more information on Megan's music, check out
www.myspace.com/meganandersonrocks
http://www.myspace.co...

For directions and info on Midway, check out www.midwaycafe.com
http://www.midwaycafe...
item.name: MEGAN ANDERSON'S "Off the Record" CD RELEASE PARTY
